name: The Ultimate Tic Tac Toe
description:
Bored of the old Tic Tac Toe game. Why not play a new one?

Welcome to Ultimate Tic Tac Toe!

So, basically, here's the link that what this is actually about: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ultimate_tic-tac-toe

So, in a box, if Red (X) or Blue (O) cross a box like a normal Tic Tac Toe, the bow belongs to the one who did the row. The one with the most wins!

If you still don't understand, see the wiki link!

Note: It is a Multiplayer Game, not AI.

Extra - Consider buying me a coffee ☕ before downloading the game!
